00088    /**
00089     * @param string $value
00090     * @param boolean $encrypt
00091     * @return User_Data
00092     */
00093     public function setPassword($value, $crypt = false)
00094     {
00095         $rules = 'required|max_length[50]|min_length[5]';
00096         if ($this->validate($rules, 'password', $value)) {
00097 
00098             if ($crypt === true) {
00099 
00100                 $value = $this->cryptPassword($value);
00101             }
00102 
00103             $this->_password = $value;
00104         }
00105 
00106         return $this;
00107     }
00108     
00109     
00110     /**
00111      * @param string $pass
00112      * @param string $salt
00113      * @return string
00114      */
00115     private function cryptPassword($pass, $salt = '')
00116     {
00117         $salt = ($salt=='') ? random_string('alnum', 8) : $salt;
00118         return (crypt($pass, '$1$' . $salt . '$'));
00119     }
00120 
00121     /**
00122      * @param string $pass
00123      * @return boolean
00124      */
00125     public function checkPassword($pass)
00126     {
00127         if (!isset($this->_password)) return false;
00128     
00129         list(,, $salt, $unsalted) = explode('$', $this->_password);
00130     
00131         return ($this->_password == $this->cryptPassword($pass, $salt));
00132     }
00133
